profile: Hello! I am a full-stack JavaScript developer with a strong focus on front-end development using React and back-end development with Node.js. I specialize in building dynamic, responsive web applications that provide seamless user experiences.

My expertise includes creating and consuming REST APIs, as well as working with both SQL and NoSQL databases. I am dedicated to delivering robust and efficient solutions that meet business needs and enhance overall functionality.

skills.name: HTML/CSS
skills.value: Strong understanding of HTML markup and CSS styling, including responsive design (using media queries, flexbox, or CSS grid layouts), CSS preprocessors (e.g., Sass), and CSS frameworks (e.g., Bootstrap, Tailwind CSS)

skills.name: JavaScript/TypeScript
skills.value: Proficient in JavaScript/TypeScript programming, with a strong understanding of its core concepts, features, and modern ES6+ syntax

skills.name: React/Next/Remix
skills.value: Proficient in React library, including its component-based architecture, virtual DOM, and state management concepts. Experienced in building dynamic user interfaces and scalable web applications with its popular frameworks such as Next.js and Remix, leveraging their server-side rendering (SSR) capabilities, routing, and API integration features to create high-performance and SEO-friendly applications

skills.name: REST API/GraphQL
skills.value: Understanding of RESTful principles and experience in consuming and integrating data from APIs, including handling requests, authentication, data manipulation, and implementing GraphQL queries and mutations.

skills.name: Node.js
skills.value: Proficient in Node.js, utilizing its powerful runtime environment for server-side development. Experienced in frameworks like Express and Nest.js, enabling the creation of scalable and modular applications.

skills.name: DBs
skills.value: Experienced with both SQL and NoSQL databases. Proficient in database technologies such as MongoDB, PostgreSQL, and MySQL, including designing schemas, writing complex queries, optimizing performance, and ensuring data integrity and security.
